## VMKeyboard.type() method

Sends a low-level keydown and keyup event for each character in the text.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type(text: string, options?: {
        delay?: number | undefined;
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string | text to type |
|  options | { delay?: number \| undefined; } | <code>delay</code>: delay in milliseconds between keydown and keyup events |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
